about_the_game:
Flynn Casey stands as a paradox—a savant detective to some, a criminal-in-making to others. A reserved maverick with an ruthless determination to solve cases, Flynn's professional prowess knows no bounds. However, in the realm where his investigative expertise reigns supreme, his personal life is a battleground of grief and neglect.

With a sudden departure of his north star - his to-be-wife, Flynn must now navigate life by himself, but this absence also opened his eye to the one's ignored, his family and friends.

And in a place where his expertise is seldom required, he is left aimless - but not for long!

Further Education is a Globe spanning adventure, with mystery and conspiracy; one of crime and violence; one of Friendship and Love.
Can one hand that can hurt, can also soothe a child?
That's the story of You, flynn casey.

Carmine


You're whatever you are, because of her - she could've just walked away but no, she stayed and she made you in the man that you are.

She's not just a exceptional inspector or a unrivaled physical specimen, because above all else, she's cute.

Elodie


Like Iron sharpens Iron - you both have tempered, sharpened and hardened yourselves to a unimaginable degree.

Though her methods differ from yours, she's just as exceptional as you're when it comes to solving cases.
Almost joined by the hip since childhood, her love for you transcends labels, sexuality and status.

Roy


A Texan who just showed up one day in Iceland and became your friend at school - how and why?
Does it matter?

A troubled soul with demons of his own, and yet tries his best to be your "Big Brother", he's that much needed male presence in your life that you can't do without and who can't do without out.

Ava


She came in your life to comfort you and carmine in hard times, stayed for the pleasure of seeing your become the man that you're today.

Not by blood, but she's your mom through and through.

Xiomara


You don't know much about her, but she's nice.

Being Ava's niece, she already sees you as a big brother of sorts, let's see how you both can help each other.

Runa/Ayati


Your compass, your north star, your everything;
The reason for the first butterflies in your stomach to your first real heartbreak.

Though not physically, she's within you, in everything you do.

Developers Notes

Further Education is a magical realistic experience - full of exciting cases, international conspiracy, realistic violence but also about Friendship, Love and just being a human.
While this will have spicy moments, this is NOT a porn game - please do not expect gratuitous depictions of sex and ham-fisted sensuality, same goes for the violence.

If you want to be entertained? this is for you!
